name: ggj22_duality_doublestandard
description:
As part of the GLOBAL GAME JAM 2022 - the aim is to create a game within 48 hours surrounding a theme.

2022 theme - Duality.

"Double Standard" is an action platformer where players can collect coins while avoiding obstacles. Players play as a man who can swap between his living and his dead self, and explore the 2 different (but alike) worlds by swapping between the two. (Meant to have doors for more encouragement to swap in between but ran out of time).

Play FULL SCREEN. Bugs and glitches will occur since it's a quick prototype. Assets not created by me.
